page.title: 04 MY LIFE ON THE FARM
page.content: On the farm I have to get up in the morning at about eight o'clock,and move the horse and the two goats.We have a nanny goat and a kid.After that I go and help milk the cows.At lunch-time my dad moves the cows. We have two milking cows,one heifer and four bulls.After school in the afternoon I move the horse.Then I help mum and dad milk. Sometimes my mum makes yoghurt.She sells the milk to her customers.She also has a self-catering cottage. Every year in the summer we have to cart the hay.I always help my dad cart.This year we had 1,579 bales.
